Code.Name: Private Sector
Code.Description: Private sector is runed by individuals and organizations/companies to generate profit.

Code.Name: Public Sector
Code.Description: Public sector that are owned and operated by the government.

Code.Name: non-profit sector
Code.Description: Non-profit sectors as non-profit organization, non-business entity, nonprofit institution etc.

Code.Name: All sectors
Code.Description: All sectors, i.e. private, public and non-profit sectors.
